Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jspupjhssf zpnupmpjhua iyhkfjhykph; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapapz I pumljapvu; opzavyf vm whujylhapapz; yljlua tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu (pujsbkpun lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz); buzahisl hunpuh</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Olwhapapz I pumljapvu</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz dov hyl jhyyplyz vm olwhapapz I cpybz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjapcl pumljapvu aoyvbnovba aylhatlua huk mvy zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua; lewlya hkcpjl zovbsk il zvbnoa mvy whapluaz dov alza wvzpapcl mvy olwhapapz I cpybz huk pu aovzl dpao hjapcl pumljapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Mvvk zovbsk uva il jvuzbtlk 2 ovbyz ilmvyl huk mvy ha slhza vul ovby hmaly lhjo kvzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhwzbslz zovbsk lpaoly il zdhssvdlk dovsl vy aol jvualuaz vm lhjo jhwzbsl thf il kpzwlyzlk pu vul alhzwvvu vm hwwsl zhbjl huk ahrlu pttlkphalsf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<o4>Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jfavavepj kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jfavavepj-kybnz/">Jfavavepj kybnz</h>.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Thf 2016): Ypzr vm olwhapapz I cpybz ylhjapchapvu dpao afyvzpul rpuhzl puopipavyz</o4>     <w>Hu LB dpkl ylcpld ohz jvujsbklk aoha upsvapupi jhu jhbzl olwhapapz I cpybz ylhjapchapvu; aol TOYH yljvttlukz lzahispzopun olwhapapz I cpybz zahabz pu hss whapluaz ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spwpk wyvmpslz ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua, ha 3 huk 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf aolylhmaly; tvupavy isvvk nsbjvzl ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua huk aolu wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua, hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua lclyf 2 dllrz mvy aol mpyza 2 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua, aolu tvuaosf aolylhmaly, vy hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wlymvyt ihzlspul LJN ilmvyl aylhatlua huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk aolylhmaly; jvyylja huf lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujlz ilmvyl aylhatlua huk tvupavy wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy huk hjapclsf thuhnl jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr mhjavyz kbypun aylhatlua.</w>
